title: Vocal Group
subtitle: The heart and soul of our orchestra's vocal performances
bannerDescription: Bringing musical stories to life through the power of voice
aboutParagraph1: The Atid Raziel Vocal Group was established in 2015 as an integral part of our orchestra, bringing a new dimension to our performances through the power of the human voice. Comprising professional vocalists with diverse backgrounds in classical, contemporary, and traditional music, our vocal ensemble enriches the orchestral experience with their exceptional talent and versatility.
aboutParagraph2: The vocal group regularly performs with the full orchestra but also presents specialized vocal concerts and participates in community outreach programs, sharing the joy of vocal music with audiences of all ages and backgrounds.

leader.name: Sophia Goldberg
leader.bio: Sophia Goldberg is an internationally acclaimed vocal coach and conductor with over 20 years of experience in choral and operatic direction. Since joining Atid Raziel Orchestra in 2015, she has transformed our vocal group into a versatile ensemble capable of performing everything from Renaissance madrigals to contemporary compositions.

specialization.title: Specialization
specialization.description: Choral conducting, operatic direction, and vocal technique with expertise in both Western classical traditions and Eastern European folk styles.

soloistsDescription: Meet the talented vocalists who bring our musical stories to life
